name: Kingdom Of Loathing Dark theme -- reverse images
description: PLEASE DO NOT USE STYLISH. It was sold to an ad company. On firefox, I recommend stylrrr. On chrome, I don't know of any good extension, so my recommendation is to enable developer mode and find an old version of stylish to install. This is a Kingdom of loathing dark theme which is as far as I know the only one which also reverses images. I created it because I wanted a dark theme, but all of the ones I encountered used the images as normal, which IMO is just ugly.
additional_info:
The way it works is basically: reverse images, reverse text, and then special-case everything else. The code is a mess, and I wouldn't delve into it at any cost if I were you. That said, if you spot a bug, don't hesitate to tell me, and if you spot a bug and know how to fix it with CSS, thank you.

Thanks go to Plastikmaniac for the rounded borders and the gradients on the page titles. These don't seem like large contributions -- but trust me, they are.

Known bugs:
  • A lot of locations such as bordertown and degrassi knoll don't look right because of "1x1trans.gif"
  • There's no border on the left side of the odd jobs board.
  • On Firefox, the titles are slightly wider that the borders
  • Some titles are messed up in the inventory.
  • The top of the currently focused chat tab is a little off.
Changelog: Not updated very frequently, but then again, this userstyle isn't updated very frequently.
  • 2016-04-30: minor updates to chat tabs to make them look better
  • 2016-05-12: (mostly) fix the VIP pool (not to be confused with the VIP pool table
  • 2016-05-16: fix daily reminders
  • 2016-05-19: fix matrix-style characters in The Source challenge path
  • 2016-10-20: properly show blur when you're drunk enough

discussions.name: Works well, so far it's just what I needed.
